text: <@U25PYL3Q8> I actually am getting enterprise account but wasn’t sure if I need additional portal too

I couldn’t find a BUG channel so I’m just dropping this right here.  I’ve gotten a few questions about issues with using the simple menu module and not being able to type in the field.

I just tested it in Safari in an isolated scenario (new blank template) and was able to repeat the issue.
maybe there should be a bug channel….
We are working on improving some of things inside of the Slack. This is on that list :slightly_smiling_face:
